string_table.str: Set rally point for new units
Creates a short-term rapid healing zone.
Ranged Hero Has ground pound AoE attack
The cooldown and cost of all leader powers is reduced.
All leader powers now have reduced cooldown and cost.
Further reduce the cost and cooldown of all leader powers.
The cooldown and cost of all leader powers have now been reduced further.
Reduce the cost and cooldown for all leader powers even further.
The cooldown and cost of all leader powers have now been reduced even further.
Further reduced cost and cooldown for all leader powers.
Whenever a leader power is used, nearby units and structures heal and gain a brief boost to speed and damage. Consecutive leader powers extend that buff.
Whenever a leader power is used, nearby units and structures heal and gain a brief boost to speed and damage. Consecutive leader powers extend that buff.
Increases the AoE, speed, damage and healing effect of Conduit of Rage.
Whenever a leader power is used, nearby units and structures heal and gain a brief boost to speed and damage. Consecutive leader powers extend that buff.
Further increases the AoE, speed, damage and healing effect of Conduit of Rage.
Whenever a leader power is used, nearby units and structures heal and gain a brief boost to speed and damage. Consecutive leader powers extend that buff.
Places units within a large target area into temporary stasis to protect allies or neutralize enemies.
Activate to place units within a large target area into temporary stasis to protect allies or neutralize enemies.
Unlocks the Phantom for purchase at your base.
Phantoms have been unlocked for purchase at your base.
Fires a plasma bolt at a targeted location.
Activate to fire a plasma bolt at a targeted location.
Adds an extra manually fired shot. Increases plasma bolt size.
Activate to fire a plasma bolt at a targeted location. Two shots available.
Adds another extra manually fired shot. Further increases plasma bolt size.
Activate to fire a plasma bolt at a targeted location. Three shots available.
Deploys squads of veteran Elite Enforcers.
Activate to deploy squads of veteran Elite Enforcers.
Places units into temporary stasis to protect allies or neutralize enemies.
Activate to place units into temporary stasis to protect allies or neutralize enemies.
Increases the duration and area of effect of stasis.
Activate to place units within a large target area into temporary stasis to protect allies or neutralize enemies.
Increases the duration and area of effect of stasis.
Deploys mines that stun and immobilize enemy units.
Activate to deploy mines that stun and immobilize enemy units.
Stasis mines now have a larger area of effect.
Drops a veteran Brute Grenadier into battle. Creates an infusion pool upon landing, which slows and damages enemy ground units.
Activate to drop a veteran Brute Grenadier into battle Creates an infusion pool upon landing, which slows and damages enemy ground units.
Ignites all areas of infusion you've placed, massively increasing their damage. Cataclysm even damages structures and air units.
Activate to ignite all areas infusion you've placed, massively increasing their damage. Cataclysm even damages structures and air units.
Ignites all areas of infusion you've placed, massively increasing their damage. Cataclysm even damages structures and air units.
Activate to ignite all areas infusion you've placed, massively increasing their damage. Cataclysm even damages structures and air units.
Heals and repairs all units and structures within infusion pools, and briefly buffs their speed and damage.
Activate to heal and repair all units and structures within infusion zones, and briefly buff their speed and damage.
Increases the buff duration and healing effect.
Activate to heal and repair all units and structures within infusion zones, and briefly buffs their speed and damage.
Further increases the buff duration and healing effect.
Activate to heal and repair all units and structures within infusion zones, and briefly buffs their speed and damage.
Deploys a mine that leaves a large, long lasting pool of infusion upon detonation. Infusion pools slow and damage enemy ground units.
Activate to deploy a mine that leaves a large, long lasting pool of infusion upon detonation. Infusion pools slow and damage enemy ground units.
Increases the damage from detonation and increases the duration of the infusion pool.
Mines now have increased damage from detonation and the infusion pool lasts longer.
Enables units to scavenge resources from enemy buildings they damage.
Units now scavenge resources from enemy buildings they damage.
Increases the amount of resources scavenged from enemy buildings.
Units now scavenge more resources from enemy buildings they damage.
Increases the damage of infusion pools. Brute Grenadiers and Infused Engineers are cheaper.
Infusion pools have increased damage. Brute Grenadiers and Infused Engineers are cheaper.
Further increases Infusion damage, Wraith Scorch and Blisterback rounds spawn infusion.
The damage of infusion pools is now further increased. Brute Grenadiers and Infused Engineers are cheaper. Wraith Scorch Mortar and Blisterback rounds now spawn infusion.
Fires a large vortex which pulls enemy units towards its center.
Activate to fire a large vortex which pulls enemy units towards its center.
Drops in a veteran Infused Engineer and veteran Marauder via a Spirit armed with Infusion rounds.
Activate to drop in a veteran Infused Engineer and veteran Marauder via a Spirit armed with Infusion rounds.
Adds a Blisterback to the drop, and exchanges the Marauder for a Wraith.
Activate to drop in a Wraith, Blisterback and veteran Infused Engineer, via a Spirit armed with Infusion rounds.
Fires a targetable vortex which damages units and structures, and leaves a trail of infusion. Infusion slows and damages enemy ground units.

Teleports enemy units anywhere within range.
Target enemy units to teleport them. Does not require vision.

Activate to create a defense weakening vortex. Focusing down targets stuns & damages them.

Activate to create a defense weakening vortex. Focusing down targets stuns & damages them.
Drops two veteran Goliaths into battle.
Activate to drop two veteran Goliaths into battle.
All owned deployed units gain a temporary siphon, speed boost and cloak.
Activate to cloak all your deployed units. While cloaked units gain speed boost and a small siphon.
Renders all deployed units invulnerable for a set time.
Activate to make all your deployed units temporarily invulnerable.
Reduced cost and research time to the Stronghold upgrade, Fortify upgrade and turret upgrades. Reduced cost to base level turrets, shield towers, and Outposts.
The Stronghold, Fortify, & turret upgrades now have reduced cost & research time. Base level turrets, shield towers, & Outposts now cost less.
Further improves all currently provided bonuses.
The Stronghold, Fortify, & turret upgrades now have further reduced cost & research time. Base level turrets, shield towers, & Outposts now cost much less.
Massive call-in of various units. Buffs units in the landing zone with Vehicle Symbiotes.
Massive call-in of various units. Buffs units in the landing zone with Vehicle Symbiotes.
Unleashes 8 beams that converge to create a massive blast.
Activate to unleash 8 converging plasma beams. Once converged a massive blast is triggered. Damages all unit types and buildings.
Drops a cluster of cloaked mines onto the battlefield.
Activate to drop a line of cloaked mines. Once armed, mines explode on contact. Does not damage air units.
Drops a cluster of cloaked mines onto the battlefield.
Activate to drop a line of cloaked mines. Once armed, mines explode on contact. Does not damage air units.

Faster capture speed for all units. Infantry sight range increased.
Capture speed for all units able to capture is now faster. Infantry sight range is now increased.
Ghosts can capture points. Vehicles sight increased. Makes Ghosts, Wraiths, and Marauders faster.

Capture speed for all units is now faster. Ghosts can now capture points.

Makes Ghosts, Wraiths, and Marauders faster.

Drops mines around newly captured points, slows enemy decap rate. Jump Pack Brutes drop Trip Mines when in flight.

Mines will now drop around newly captured resource points. Enemy decap rate is now slowed on all points you control.
Jump Pack Brutes will now drop Trip Mines when in flight.
Drops a cloaked vision-providing mine onto the battlefield.
Activate to drop a cloaked Scout Mine. Explodes on contact, also provides vision within a small area.
Increases mine damage and vision range.
Activate to drop a cloaked Scout Mine. Explodes on contact, also provides vision within a small area.
Unlocks the Skitterer scout unit for purchase at your base.

Place two connected teleporation nodes. Can be used by all players.

Activate to get a drop-off of: 2 upgraded veteran Suicide Grunts. 2 upgraded veteran Jump Pack Brutes.

Freezes units and buildings in the area, stopping all movement and actions. Frozen targets can be shattered to inflict heavy damage.

Drops cloaked mines onto the battlefield. Once armed, mines explode on contact. Explosion chills or freezes enemies. Does not damage air units.

Drops a huge cryogenic charge. Creates a long-lasting ice storm upon impact, which chills over time.
Activate to drop a huge cryogenic charge. Creates a long-lasting ice storm upon impact, which chills over time.
Gives turrets and owned power nodes a chill aura.

All turrets and power nodes have a chill aura. Chill causes units to slow down, capture slower and do less damage. Once enough chill has built up, units freeze. Frozen units can be shattered for large damage.

Manually drop multiple chilling ice blocks. Freezes nearby units when destroyed.
